author: ASFN Admin
title: Royals put big dent in Twins' wild-card bid with 3-1 win (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 54,015 Royals put big dent in Twins' wild-card bid with 3-1 win (Yahoo Sports) Ben Zobrist put a major dent in Minnesota's postseason bid with an RBI double in the eighth inning against struggling All-Star Glen Perkins, and the Kansas City Royals topped the Twins 3-1 on Friday night. Perkins, hampered by neck and back trouble that led to his removal from the closer role, spoiled a stellar start by Ervin Santana (7-5) with a first-pitch fastball that Zobrist drove off the wall in right-center field. Zobrist then scored when right fielder Torii Hunter fumbled a single by Mike Moustakas, another blemish on an awful second half for Perkins.
